law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 57, effective June 15, 1950. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739j-71, 2739j-72, 2739j-76, 2739j-89.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Filing of bond, insurance policy or deposit; amendment, transfer, duration, renewal, cancellation, revocation, suspension or alteration of permit.
